TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Undead. You will not be able to find the Elven captives until they are out of your way.
You have failed to defeat the Baneguard.
You have walked into a trap. You are surrounded by the Undead.
Travel to the Iceguard Keep to pick up the trail left by the Undead.
The tracks left by the Undead lead you to the Lake of Blood. Travel there to find the Elven captives.
Return to Ehlariel and report the grim fate of the Elven captives.
You have been rewarded for your effort on this dangerous mission. You are awarded the Iceguard.
You have defeated the Undead and uncovered a trail leading to the Lake of Blood. You need to follow this trail if you want to rescue the Elven captives.
You must return to Ehlariel and report the grim fate of the Elven captives.
The Baneguard have more spells than a regular Doomknight. They can cast Cleave and Bone Strike. They also have more Life Points and Battle skill.
